website_summaries.verdict: For beer can chicken without the actual can, an inexpensive unit that works in a smoker, on the grill, or in the oven.
pros: Set of two cooking cones – one for a chicken, one for up to an 18-lb
The center hole is large enough to hold a combination of liquids, vegetables, and spices – including an entire bottle of barbecue sauce
Dishwasher safe and extremely easy to clean
Users uneasy with metal beer can roasters are pleased with this ceramic option
cons: Steamer does not come with a drip pan
Should be coated with a cooking spray beforehand to prevent sticking

customer_reviews.title: Super moist chicken and couldn’t be simpler to use!
customer_reviews.text: This worked perfectly on a huge chicken, a little over 6 pounds! My only concern is that I’m sure it will be fragile and it will require a little extra care in cleaning. But, this was the best chicken I’ve ever cooked on my Pit Boss smoker, hands down. I am looking for whole chickens on sale and may purchase another one of these so I can do two at a time. We used Dr. Pepper plus rubs both in the Steamer and on the chicken. Great flavor, smoke, and moist beyond belief.
customer_reviews.author: NBC TN

customer_reviews.title: Very Good for Whole Poultry Cooking
customer_reviews.text: These ceramic holders work perfectly for chicken. And the large one worked for a turkey, but not quiet as you might think. I mean, it held the liquid with herbs just fine. Even though I have plently of vertical room for the turkey to stand up like the lighter chicken, the turkey had to kind of lean over. It was fine because this container remained in position. I cooked the turkey with the container inside an aluminum roasting pan. I used a smoker. But, this would work just as well in a closed BBQ grill or even a regular oven. The meat comes out juicy. Of course the same was true for chicken. I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: The BanjoNut

customer_reviews.title: Better ways to do this.
customer_reviews.text: Really could not get a 15lb turkey to sit on the stand properly. It would flop over and the back would be toward the dome of my grill, not what you want!. I believe a cage type where you could put a can inside would be better than this. I ended up putting the turkey in a roasting pan after spending 20 minutes trying to make it work. Nice idea but not practical.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: forget the old beer can!
customer_reviews.text: Never made "beer can chicken" before, and now that I have these 2 amazing cooking devices, I never will need to use a beer can. These are amazing, simply put. High quality, easy to use, basically fool proof. I used the smaller one with a 4.8 pound chicken on my Vision kamado grill, and the results were awesome! You cannot go wrong here and don't know what you've been missing.
customer_reviews.author: Teri 's fire

customer_reviews.title: Lasted one cook, but turkey was delicious!
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, lasted only one cook - but turkey was excellent. I cooked my turkey on the grill for Thanksgiving. The turkey insert last almost through the entire cook, which was at 325 for about 3 hours (I had this and the turkey on a heat deflector). I went to take the turkey off when the breast reached 165, and the thigh was 180, but noticed the bottom of the insert had cracked and all of the beer spilled into my deflector pan. Despite how fragile this apparently is, the turkey turned out awesome!
customer_reviews.author: STL Redbird

customer_reviews.title: Even cooks chicken in smoker, BBQ or in the oven, a must have.
customer_reviews.text: These are great to cook chickens and other large birds in the oven, smoker or BBQ, I've tried all three and turns out great. Putt your favorite beer or Sauce in the center. Be sure to spray with cooking oil inside and out for easy cleaning prior to using. Good price on Amazon and fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: BigD

customer_reviews.title: Add whatever you like to the base and Viola
customer_reviews.text: Add whatever you like to the base and Viola; you have a great flavored Chicken. Like it better than the wire rack for Beer Chicken. Just add the beer to the base! It also is sturdy and easy to take off the grill and onto a platter for carviing. Just tried the onion, sausage and bbq sauce recipe. Stuffed the base, afixed the Chicken and about 90 minutes at 350, cooked a Chicken just over 5lbs. Deeeelish!!
customer_reviews.author: Bob L

customer_reviews.title: Made a great gift for Brother in Law
customer_reviews.text: The Auburn sweatshirt I ordered for my BIL never arrived, so I quickly had to another Christmas gift for him. He and my sister got themselves a Big Green Egg for Christmas and I went looking for an accessory for them. Well, they love these! They are well made ceramic and look nice. You can't see it from the picture, but the bottom is solid, like it's a funny shaped cup. In there you put your liquid and spices then sit the chicken or turkey cavity over the top, so the bird looks like it's standing up. You'll have the most moist and delicious smoked chicken or turkey you've ever eaten! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Both will work on chicken
customer_reviews.text: They work great. I didn't have enough headroom in my smoker for the Sittin-Turkey but it will also work on a large chicken. I used it on a 5lb chicken.
customer_reviews.author: P. Stenzel

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: My Sitting chicken and Turkey ceramic steamer look great and seem to be sturdy built. Not sure how easy they will be to clean because of the way their shaped. Will use them this weekend and give an update about that. Overall I'm very happy with steamer and feel it's a must have for people who BBQ alot. Update my Sitting chicken works great. Strongly reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Connin

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: We have used this item twice and just noticed a huge crack running from the top down to the mid section of the vessel. We replaced the first one, due to hairline cracks all over and we did not want to risk using it. Now the return window has closed and we are stuck with faulty product.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Vermaak

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Used only the chicken size so far. Works perfectly. Any flavoring you want in the liquid inside is possible. Made a rub of my own. Moist and tender. Easy to remove from stand.
customer_reviews.author: bzarre1

customer_reviews.title: Ummmm.... No Sir.
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand why my turkey was not sitting on this "sittin turkey". I was hoping for a nicely browned turkey but it was not at all. My tuekey was only 12.84lbs so its not like it was that big. Thankfully the turkey was nicely seasoned so we ignored the color and enjoyed the delicious meat. Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: musiclover1

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Great porcelain product. Works well with indirect heat and the final high heat of crisping of the chicken skin. Very moist meat from cooking. Cleans easily.
customer_reviews.author: J. Levesque

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting chix!
customer_reviews.text: We've only used the smaller one so far, but it worked great! I would've given 5 stars, but there were no direction with it. I had to look them up.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer helgeson

customer_reviews.title: The best for smoking!
customer_reviews.text: This is the one! Sturdy and no need for a beer can. Totally balanced for chicken or turkey. But, if you want to smoke two chickens or turkeys order two...I am! Way better than the wire counterparts! And because it doesn't hold heat a more when cook!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Kuntz

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Use these on my Pit Boss all the time, and are a great way to make juicy poultry. The instructions were pretty good that came with the kit. Would buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Chief Grey Mist

customer_reviews.title: Our grill master loves these!
customer_reviews.text: Got these to make drunken chickens on our smoker. Worked perfect! We can’t wait to try them out on a bigger bird.
customer_reviews.author: Zoey Karimzada

customer_reviews.title: Gotta use the right end
customer_reviews.text: This only works if the chicken is properly marked. I spent an hour trying to get an unmarked chicken mounted upside down. Apparently their necks are smaller than their butts, with time, I’ll probably figure it out, but I DO think that better marked chickens would help. The product is cool tho.
customer_reviews.author: Griff

customer_reviews.title: Clean and neat, great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, excellent price, and easy to use. The only thing is it does sit higher then most beer can type cookers. I used it in my traeger grill 20-in model in the chicken touches the very top.
customer_reviews.author: John W. Ivery

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Worked well better than we thought it would. Good buy. Nice to have different sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yumm-ola!
customer_reviews.text: Haven't tried the big one (turkey is in the freezer waiting its turn) but the small one is awesome for chicken on our Big Green Egg. Better than the wire versions in my opinion. You can add any liquid you want. I've heard that the paint on some beer cans can peel under heat, so this is a good way to avoid that. 350 degree grill until the bird reaches 165 degrees and WOW, talk about tender! I give this ten thumbs up for beer can chicken and I expect no less for the turkey sized version.
customer_reviews.author: Trouty

customer_reviews.title: No more falling chicken
customer_reviews.text: Good product. I use it all the time when I'm smoking chicken. Don't have to worry about the chicken falling over, a little hard to clean, but still worth it. Just use a bottle brush...
customer_reviews.author: Don J Torre

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome replacement for a beer can I never liked the idea of hearing a tin can

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. I did my first beer (can) chicken and it turned out perfect. I would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: old man

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Made chicken and put apple juice in them. Best chicken yet!

customer_reviews.title: they work
customer_reviews.text: i put them in a drip pan to catch all the goodies when cooking

customer_reviews.text: Held my 19 pound turkey on the grill perfectly. No risk of tipping over after the bird has started cooking. A great way to roast.

Ceramic is way easier to clean than any other stainless or nonstick upright roaster I have used in the past.

product_meta.title: Cook's Choice Ceramic Steamer Beer Can Roasters Combo Pack- Sittin' Chicken and Turkey Marinade Barbecue Cookers- Infuse BBQ flavors
product_meta.description:
Beer can chicken has never tasted so good. Grill to perfection with the sittin' chicken or sittin' turkey flavor infusor. Simply pour in your favorite beer, add a few dashes of seasoning and slow cook on the grill or oven for the most tasty chicken ever.

AMAZON.COM
These two ceramic cones, one for a chicken and one for a turkey, make an easier and safer alternative to cooking with an actual beer can. The method is the same: liquid is put in a cylinder that goes up inside the bird's cavity, and as the liquid heats during grilling it creates steam that keeps the bird moist. Beer isn't even required-the Sittin' Chicken or Sittin' Turkey cones can hold butter, olive oil, garlic, fruit juice, soda, or chunks of onion, apple or lemon. For extra flavor marinade can be injected into the bird and the outside rubbed with spices. An onion or potato stuffed in the neck opening of the bird helps keep the moisture in. After a couple hours of slow cooking on the grill, the result is a bird crispy on the outside with flavorful and moist meat. 

 The ceramic cones are designed with wide bases to prevent tipping, and are glazed inside and out to make clean-up a snap-the cones go right into the dishwasher. Spraying a cone with a nonstick vegetable spray before sitting the bird on top will make the job even easier. The underside of the base is unglazed to go directly on a grill. If the cones are used in an oven, a pan of water or sheet of aluminum foil needs to go underneath to catch drips. The Sittin' Chicken measures 5 by 4-1/4 inches, while the Sittin' Turkey measures 6 by 6 inches and can hold a turkey weighing up to 18 pounds. This set with one of each makes a great gift for the outdoor chef. --Ann Bieri
feature_bullets: Set of 2 cooking cones, 1 for a chicken, 1 for up to an 18-pound turkey
Ceramic glazed inside and out for easy dishwasher clean-up
Unglazed bottom sits directly on a grill; wide base won't tip over
Inside holds beer, juice, or marinade to add moisture to a bird
Chicken cone measures 5 by 4-1/4 inches; turkey, 6 by 6 inches
